entry.title: Saturday: Rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Rain. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind southeast 30 km/h increasing to 50 gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 over exposed coastal sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Rain ending late this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 04 February 2023
